executable.title: GenerateMedianFilteredImage
executable.description: Median Filter of a CT volume
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and women's hospital

integer-vector.name: lowerClipValues
integer-vector.label: lowerClipValues
integer-vector.description: Lower clip value applied to input image before filtering. This flag should be followed by two values: the first value is the clip value and the second value is the replacement value (i.e., everything below the clip value will be assigned the replacement value)

integer-vector.name: upperClipValues
integer-vector.label: upperClipValue
integer-vector.description: Upper clip value applied to input image before filtering. This flag should be followed by two values: the first value is the clip value and the second value is the replacement value (i.e., everything below the clip value will be assigned the replacement value)
